full_summary:
================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Document Reference:** WS3870604613-Doc3870604668

**Amendment Information**
-------------------------

An amendment to the original tender announcement has been published, making this the version 1 amendment.

**Tender Information**
-------------------------

*   **Tender Title:** Environmental Site Assessments and Risk Management Services for the Clearance and Remediation of Former Camp Ipperwash

*   **Reference Number:** WS3870604613-Doc3870604668

*   **Publication Date:** February 14, 2023

*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Competition Information**
---------------------------

This tender is a request for proposal (RFP) and is being held under the Competitive - Open Bidding procurement method. All bids will be assessed based on the following criteria:

*   Technical Merit
*   Price

The tender will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating.

**Contract Information**
-------------------------

The contract is for Environmental Site Assessments, Human Health and Ecological Risk Assessments, and Risk Management Services. The required services will be provided on an as-and-when-requested basis upon receipt of a Task Authorization.

The contract period is from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2025, and includes an option to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Solicitation Information**
---------------------------

The solicitation number for this tender is WS3870604613.

**Attachments**
---------------

Please note that the Request for Proposal (RFP) and all attachments can be accessed and downloaded by logging in to your SAP Ariba account.

**Submission**
--------------

All bids must be submitted electronically through the SAP Ariba system. Please ensure that all required bidding and supporting documentation is submitted by the tender closing date and time to be considered responsive.

**Language**
------------

Documents may be submitted in either French or English.

Note to contractor:
You can find the correct link to access the Ariba Discovery posting in the original text. Here is the correct link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15405023](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15405023)
